alert.note: Alert for Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:51PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN FRESNO COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM PDT... At 150 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers 16 miles west of North Lake Campground, or 18 miles west of Aspendell, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Upper Burnt Corral. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Hanford CA.

area.areaDesc: Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River
